name: State: Scorching Heat
effect: During this turn, all combustion or oxidation reactions gain +20% damage, but the stability of your compounds decreases by 1 point.
flavor: Extreme heat accelerates reactions but also destabilizes molecular structures.

name: State: Glacial Cold
effect: Reduce the energy cost of Elemental cards by 1 during this turn and freeze an opponent's Reaction card, preventing it from activating on their next turn.
bonus: Reduces energy cost of elemental reactions
flavor: Frost not only preserves but also freezes the opponent's opportunities.

name: State: Extreme Pressure
effect: Increase the stability of all your compounds by 1 point, but raise the energy cost of activating reactions by 1 during this turn.
flavor: Under overwhelming pressure, solidity strengthens, but energy becomes scarcer.

name: State: Space Vacuum
effect: Nullify the effect of an opponent's Catalyst or Scientist card during this turn, simulating an environment devoid of physical support.
flavor: In the vacuum, the rules of reaction are redefined, rendering enemy strategies ineffective.

name: State: Liquid Flow
effect: Allows you to swap two Elemental cards in your hand at no cost, representing the fluidity and adaptability of the liquid state.
bonus: Increases card flexibility and strategic swaps
flavor: Like water, your strategies adapt and flow, always finding the path to victory.

name: State: Plasma Ionization
effect: Activates a chain reaction that triggers random effects on the battlefield, potentially increasing or reducing damage by 50% during this turn.
flavor: The energy of plasma is as unpredictable as it is electrifying, altering the rules of the game with every spark.
